sen.j: 丹後弁（たんごべん）は、京都府宮津市から京丹後市を中心に話されている日本語の方言の一種。
sen.e: Tango dialect is a kind of Japanese dialect that is spoken mainly in the areas encompassing Miyazu City, Kyoto Prefecture and Kyotango City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Tango dialect is a kind of Japanese dialect that is spoken mainly in an area encompassing Miyazu City, Kyoto Prefecture and Kyotango City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Tango dialect is a kind of Japanese dialect that is spoken mainly in an area encompassing Miyazu City, Kyoto Prefecture and Kyotango City, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 語彙、発音は中国方言に近い。
sen.e: Its vocabulary and pronunciation is similar to Chugoku dialect.
Its vocabulary and pronunciation is similar to Chugoku dialect.
Its vocabulary and pronunciation is similar to Chugoku dialect.

sen.j: 語尾に「～だあや」「～だで」「～わや」「～わ」がつく事が多い。
sen.e: Sentences tend to end in '-daaya', '-dade', '-waya' and '-wa.'
Sentences tend to end in '-daaya', '-dade', '-waya' and '-wa.'
Sentences tend to end in '-daaya', '-dade', '-waya' and '-wa.'

sen.j: どうで（どぉで）とは、何でという意味である。
